title: Biology Course
about: In this course students will learn exactly what they need to know for their biology exams.
PAST PAPER EXAM QUESTION WALKTHROUGHS

title: Best Way to Learn German Language: Full Beginner
about: How to speak and write German (beginner A1 level) and have fun while doing so!
Use the German language with confidence and ease
Learn important vocabulary and phrases that you can use in everyday situations, on holidays or for business
Develop all the necessary language skills to finally get fluent in German

title: The Circular Economy
about: After taking this course, you will understand what the circular economy is, where it originated, how to discover new circular ideas and how to create value.
You will also discover where to look for financing and how to take the first step.
You will end the course very inspired and ready to change your corner of the world.
I saved the best for the end.

title: History Course
about: Pass any basic level art history class at the college level.
Go to museums and art galleries and really understand what you are looking at.
Find out about key figures in British history
Explore concepts which have relevance today such as colonialism, a free economy and freedom of thought and religion

title: Geometry Course
about: Quadrilaterals, triangles, and circles, including calculations of angles, perimeter, and area
Transformations of figures, including translating, rotating, and reflecting
Parallels and polygons, including interior and exterior angles
Shapes in space, including distance between points in space

title: Algebra Course
about: Equations and systems of equations, including inverse operations, direct and inverse variation, and distance/rate/time problems
Fractions, exponents, and radicals, including advanced operations with all three
Graphing, including parallel and perpendicular lines, and parabolas
Functions, including domain and range, and sums and products of functions
